Abilities.Textual: auto(vc): when this unit attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your opponent's , this unit gets power+3000 until end of that battle.
Abilities.Visual: [00ff00][b]AUTO[/b][-](VC): When this unit attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your opponent's , this unit gets [00aa00][b]POWER+3000[/b][-] until end of that battle.

Abilities.Textual: auto(vc/rc): [c-blast(1)] when this unit's attack hits, if the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. if you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
Abilities.Visual: [00ff00][b]AUTO[/b][-](VC/RC): [[b][u][5555ff]C-Blast(1)[-][/u][/b]] When this unit's attack hits, if the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
